metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _UpgradeBeforeConfigurationChange function in lib/client/gnt_cluster.py in Ganeti 2.10.0 before 2.10.7 and 2.11.0 before 2.11.5 uses world-readable permissions for the configuration backup file, which allows local users to obtain SSL keys, remote API credentials, and other sensitive information by reading the file, related to the upgrade command.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganeti - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-haskell-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti2 - 2.15.2-3
python-ganeti-rapi - 2.15.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganeti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.2-3').
